sentences.en: "I really want some dessert," Keaton says, smacking his lips.
sentences.cn: “我真的很想吃点儿点心，”基顿咂着嘴说。

sentences.en: Freshly baked apple pie makes a tasty dessert.
sentences.cn: 新烤的苹果派是很可口的饭后点心.

sentences.en: He finished his dessert and patted his paunch.
sentences.cn: 他吃完甜点，拍了拍他的大肚子。

sentences.en: I have the menu all planned out, from the appetizers to the dessert.
sentences.cn: 所有东西我都策划出了，写在菜单上，有开胃食品，也有餐后甜点。

sentences.en: I was tempted by the dessert menu.
sentences.cn: 甜食菜单馋得我垂涎欲滴。

sentences.en: I'll have just a trifle of the dessert.
sentences.cn: 我只要吃少量的甜点心.

sentences.en: Scott was obviously inebriated by the time the dessert was served.
sentences.cn: 到了上甜点的时候，斯科特显然已经喝醉了。

sentences.en: She had homemade ice cream for dessert.
sentences.cn: 她用自制的冰激凌作饭后甜点。

sentences.en: They served apple pudding for dessert.
sentences.cn: 他们端上了苹果布丁作为甜食.

sentences.en: They went into the cafe for coffee and dessert.
sentences.cn: 他们到咖啡馆喝了杯咖啡,吃了些点心.

sentences.en: This dessert can be served straight from the fridge.
sentences.cn: 这种甜食从冰箱里拿出来就可以吃。

sentences.en: This dessert can be served straight from the refrigerator.
sentences.cn: 这甜点从冰箱里拿出后即可食用。

sentences.en: We had ice cream for dessert.
sentences.cn: 我们餐后吃的甜点是冰淇淋.

sentences.en: We had raspberries and cream for dessert.
sentences.cn: 我们甜点吃奶油木莓子.

sentences.en: Would you like some apple pie for dessert?
sentences.cn: 你想不想要些苹果派当甜点?

trans.tran_en: sweet food served after the main part of a meal
